author: wmtan
body: auto_ptr is deprecated in C++, but is still used in the framework in three places. One of these is the EventSetup interface, which also supports unique_ptr. This PR changes every user of EventSetup outside the framework that uses auto_ptr to use unique_ptr instead. It also uses std::make_unique when appropriate. THis PR is totally technical.
title: use unique_ptr, not auto_ptr, in EventSetup
